title: A study of the book of philippiams
description: A Study of the Book of Philippians is a Verse by Verse Analytical Study Commentary of our Bible Book Study Series on the Pauline Epistle planned for individual study, group study, Churches or students study groups. This Study creates space for an all-inclusive contributive and interactive study with important Bible statistical background- 20 different, ways of studying the bible, 7 dispensational studies, map of Philippi and much more,. This is a must read for all who want to grow and excel in their Christian faith. The truth will always set you free. Study to show yourself approved. Find out from this book, success nuggets and treasures that will translate your humble attitudes to HIGH ALTITUDES. Go for a copy now
author: Ikechukwu Joseph
